basics.label: Sales Consultant
basics.summary: I'm driven to develop and implement fresh sales and marketing strategies with financial and operational discipline. Friendly Sales Associate proficient in managing all areas of sales and customer service in fast-paced retail environments. Excellent multi-tasker and team player.

work.name: Boost Mobile of Mobile Factory
work.summary: Strategically managed and implemented sales and marketing plans. Trained new sales associates on effective techniques and helped customers select products that best fit their personal needs.
highlights: Sold 31 phones in a single day along with accessories.
Sales week record selling 199 phones and $3088 worth in accessories
Fulfilled all supervisory duties when Store Manager was on vacation

work.name: Michaels Arts & Crafts
work.summary: Assisted customers with their needs, handled money throughout the day and gave change back.

work.summary: Accepted payment from customers, cleaned up spills and trash, and took cake orders over the phone
